UiTestAutomationPlaygroundPage.description: This page demonstrates the 'Dynamic ID' challenge in UI test automation, where element IDs change on each page load, requiring robust locator strategies.

elements.name: Dynamic ID Link
elements.description: Link to the Dynamic ID challenge page.

assertions: Page title is 'UI Test Automation Playground'
Main header text is 'UI Test Automation Playground'
The 'Dynamic ID' link is present on the page.

UnknownPage.description: This page demonstrates the challenge of using dynamic IDs in UI automation. It contains a button with a dynamically generated ID.

elements.name: Dynamic ID Button
elements.description: Button with a dynamic ID. Clicking this button should trigger an action (though the action itself isn't specified on this page).

elements.name: Dynamic ID Header
elements.description: The main header of the page.

assertions: Page contains a button with the text 'Button with Dynamic ID'
